text: Martin Matupi (born 26 November 1942) is a Malawian former triple jumper. Competing in the men's triple jump at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich, he finished in 34th place with a distance of 13.57 metres. Matupi was the Malawian flag carrier in the opening ceremony at the Games. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Malawian triple jumpers Category:Malawian male athletes Category:Male triple jumpers Category:Olympic athletes of Malawi Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1972 Summer Olympics
title: Martin Matupi
